title: Interview: 2025 Nobel Peace Prize Winner on Global Cooperation
introText: The 2025 Nobel Peace Prize honored efforts to build international cooperation on climate change. In an exclusive interview, the laureate reflects on decades of work and the path forward for global action.

content.content: 'I've spent 40 years trying to get countries to work together on problems that don't respect borders,' the laureate reflects. 'Climate change is the ultimate test of whether humanity can cooperate.'
Despite setbacks, the laureate sees progress. 'The Paris Agreement, COP30, the youth movementâ€”momentum is building. We have the solutions. What we need is political will.'
'This prize belongs to everyone fighting for a livable planet. My message is simple: don't give up. History bends toward justice when people push it.'
